long_description:
The haze in this circular room is starting to clear as you hear a hissing sound.  Atop a few tables along the north wall are a clutter of bottles of liquid and connected glass piping.  You can now visibly see a locked glass display case that contains a key.  There appears to be a puzzle or maze of some sort admidst the clutter, perhaps this will help open the display case.

The only door in the room is on the west end, which leads to the Torch Corridor.
short_description:
Poisonous gas has been cleared by use of the blue-flamed arrow.  There is a display case that holds a key.
There is a door(exit) on the west end, which leads to the Torch Corridor.

Puzzle Case.name: Puzzle Case
Puzzle Case.description: This display case contains an item.
